div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 232 Oreus (anc. Histiaea), Euboea, 1902 (771) Burial: c. 171-169 B.C. (T) Contents: c. 1300 AR. Pot hoard Alexander III: 1 tetradr. (cf. RN 1963, p. 17) Philip V: 13 didr.; 11 dr. Perseus: 9 tetradr.; 1 didr. Macedonia: 1 tetrob. Lysimachus: 1 dr. Larissa: 1 triob. Aetolia: 2 triob. Chalcis: 2 dr. Histiaea: 1 dr.; 5 tetrob. Achaean League: 3 triob. Rhodes: 595 dr. Disposition: Athens 128 (Alexander; Philip V 6 didr., 8 dr.; Perseus 5 tetradr., 1 didr.; Macedonia; Lysimachus; La- rissa; Aetolia 1; Chalcis 1; Histiaea 2 tetrob.; Achaean League 3; Rhodes 97) † Svoronos, JIAN 1902, pp. 318-28, illus. (some) Robert, Études, pp. 189-90 Franke, JNG 1957, pp. 35-9 Thompson, NNM 159 (1968), pp. 92-3
